reviews.review: USE IT FOR MAPPING AND ITS GREAT

I played a lot of Source in 2007 with my old steam account. It's a better game than CS:GO for those who don't like skins and that kind of gay things like me. This is the best FPS game on Steam ;)

Recommend this game.

So many hours spent in high school surfing.  So many custom maps made in Hammer.  So much love and so many memories.  I only ever played gun game and CS_Office 24/7, but CounterStrike Source will always hold a special place in my heart.  It still holds up well too.

Get AWPed right as you turn around the corner

 12/10
  
 Will never get AWPed again...

Por onde começar? Um dos maiores néo-clássicos do Shooter em primeira pessoa  (se não for o melhor) em primeira pessoa, os pontos positivos são enormes, más não complexos, o jogo não tem enredo para se julgar, talvez atráves de histórias da VALVe tenha um pouco de conteúdo, más dentro do jogo, nada à acrecentar. Ótimo gameplay, dinâmico, presciso e muito divertido, "Massively Multiplayer", mesmo assim continua sendo um ótimo jogo, e sinceramente não tinha outro jeito de não ser Massively.
Been playing for years and still tickles my gooty hole to this day :)

Counter-Strike: Source, Counter-Strike serisi arasından en gerçekçi oyun diyebilirim. Grafik olarak Counter-Strike: Global Offensive daha iyi olsa da oynanış açısından Counter-Strike: Source diğerlerinden daha iyi.

Online oynarken farkettiğim şey Türk sunucularının çok az olması. En fazla iki tane vardır çünkü ben bütün listeyi gezmeme rağmen bir tane gördüm o da TURKKLAN sunucusuydu. Sunucudaki oyuncuların yaş aralığı genelde 20-30 arası.

Aslında Counter-Strike: Source'da aynı Global Offensive'deki gibi Türk sunucuları fazla olsaydı Source'u Global Offensive'e tercih ederdim fakat Türk sunucusu sayısı çok az olduğu için beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı. 

Şu an eğer bu oyunu satın alcaksanız Türk sunucusu bulamayacağınızı söylemeliyim sonra benim gibi hayal kırıklığına uğramayın.

Son olarak eğer LAN party yapabileceğiniz arkadaşlarınız varsa fena eğlenceli oluyo.
игра очень затягивает,а то,это же кс!

Ich HASSE die AWP,aber sonst ein gutes und realistisches Spiel!
12 von 10 Katzenbabys!
На самом деле мне кажется что единственная лучшая cs из серии, это cs 1.6, а эти 2 ( css, cs GO ) это игры на любителя.

This game is very good.Its not about graphic its about the epicness.Its really easy to play.The mods make the game more fun.It has a good experience in first person shooting.The game has 2 type of maps:   cs maps:u have to rescue the hostages or kill all terrorist.this is for ct.Terrorist have to kill all ct in order to win.

             de maps:u have to stop the terrrorist from 
                              planting the bomb.it will give only
                              one bomb for terrorist.Counter 
                               Terrorist must defuse the bomb.If 
                                u kill all the terrorist in de maps u 
                                will not win because if the bomb 
                                has already planted u have to
                                 defuse it.

If u kill the most of ct or t.U will get one star.
This game has a lot of achievements.if the time rounds out it will count as a draw.

That's all i can tell u its really hard to explain about this game enjoy pls comment.:D
a good and fun FPS with lots of servers and gamemodes
I bought this for gmod but not just for textures but for css its self its really cool and I recommenc you get this for gmod and css its self 9/10 because you die to easily but anyways good job valve!

This game is a classic.  I played CS beta HL mod, CS 1.6 and CS:GO but Source has always been my favourite.
If you're into multiplayer FPS team games I recommend you try this, it has an extremely steep learning curve but very rewarding.

Я бы мог вам посоветовать игру CS:Sours. Это игра для настоящих любителей CS. Это продукция от компании Valve. Хоть и отнасительно давний срок выпуска этой игры, но сыграло это не большую роль в сравнении с СS:Global Offensive. По сути, CS:Sourse усовершенственная, всеми любимая игра CS:1.6, а CS:Global Offensive это сын так сказать всех CS. Т.к более продвинутая(в плане технологий). Вообщем, если вы настоящий поклоник и любитель всех игр от первого лица, то вам стоит купить. А если вы не поклоник CS, а просто хотите хорошо провести время и т.д, то купите сразу набор CS.xD

Old but gold. I still play it for surf servers and to just have some fun with the overpowered Desert Eagle and awp every now and then. It's a casual game and is still very popular after ten years. Due to the large amount of servers and mods available for this game it's definitely worth it.

Counter-Strike Source-Это онлайн игра. На данный момент контра это самая знаменитая и популярная игра в сети. Сам оригинал игры(если не ошибаюсь)вышел в 2004 году, а сейчас идут просто разные модификации и сборки.Игра просто шикарная,но отнимает слишком много времени,сейчас иногда захожу что бы вспомнить истинную красоту.В игре одна задача-победить(для этого дается не плохой арсенал оружия, но конкретный ствол стоит конкретную сумму.Сейчас в контре очень много читеров и играть бывает, даже нет желания. Но на хороших серверах стоят хороший таблетки и вот именно на таковых серверах и происходят лучшие игры и турниры.
Trés bon jeux, multijoueur. A acheter
this is the best game if you like Action and shoot go buy this game
